alert.note: Alert for Lower Kuskokwim Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 15 at 2:46PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: .Severe ice jam flooding continues along the Kuskokwim River from Napaimute to Chuathbaluk. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...Kuskokwim near From Napaimute to Chuathbaluk. * WHEN...Until 945 AM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding is ongoing in the Napaimute Airport including water over the runway and flooding up to 4 ft in depth in the hangar. Water is encroaching on homes in Napaimute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 239 PM AKDT, The River Watch Team reports an ice jam on Kuskokwim near From Napaimute to Chuathbaluk. Impounding water due to the ice jam will cause rapid river rises upstream. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Move to higher ground now. Act quickly to protect your life. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
